synoptic.model.interfaces
Interface IGraph<NodeType extends INode<NodeType>>

Type Parameters:
NodeType - the class of a node in a graph
All Known Implementing Classes:
Graph, PartitionGraph
public interface IGraph<NodeType extends INode<NodeType>>

This is the interface all graphs have to provide. It requires the notions of relations, initial nodes, and terminal nodes.

Author:
sigurd

tagInitial

void tagInitial(NodeType initialNode,
                java.lang.String relation)
Mark initialNode as initial with respect to relation. Implementations should make sure that initialNode is in fact a node of the graph.

Parameters:
initialNode - the node to mark as initial
relation - the relation with respect to which the node should be initial

tagTerminal

void tagTerminal(NodeType terminalNode,
                 java.lang.String relation)
Mark terminalNode as terminal with respect to relation. Implementations should make sure that terminalNode is in fact a node of the graph.

Parameters:
terminalNode - the node to mark as terminal
relation - the relation with respect to which the node should be terminal
